title: Problemi di configurazione indirizzo mail tiscali su Thunderbird
content: Buongiorno! Da diversi giorni non riesco a utilizzare la mia mail di Tiscali su Thunderbird. La configurazione mi sembra sia corretta. La cosa strana è che da cellulare e tablet funziona come sempre, solo al pc non funziona. Ha sempre funzionato correttamente e mi spiacerebbe dover cambiare programma. Il messaggio di errore quando provo a configurare il mio indirizzo mail è: "Impossibile autenticarsi sul server. LA configurazione, il nome utente o la password potrebbero essere errati". Potete aiutarmi? Grazie!
creator: dino.meloni

title: Problém se smtp při odesláním pošty
content:
Zdravím, spravuji v Thunderbirdu verze 128.10.0esr (64 bitů) dva emaily od společnosti Centrum. S příchozími zprávami nemám problém. Problém mám s odchozí zprávou a to pouze u jednoho z těch účtů. Účet s prvním emailem A@centrum.cz má přiřazený odchozí server "Centrum A" a druhý účet s emailem B@centrum.cz má přiřazený odchozí server "Centrum B". Zde je nastavení obou identit odchozích serverů:

Centrum A smtp.centrum.cz, port 25, zabezpečení žádné, autentizace heslem jméno A@centrum.cz

Centrum B smtp.centrum.cz, port 25, zabezpečení žádné, autentizace heslem jméno B@centrum.cz

Zprávy pro účet A@centrum.cz v pořádku odchází. Při pokusu odeslání zprávy přes druhý účet B@centrum.cz dochází stále dokola k selhání s hlášením "Přihlášení k serveru smtp.centrum.cz s uživatelským jménem B@centrum.cz selhalo." Nabízí se možnost opakovat nebo vložit nové heslo. Po opakovaném pokusu vyskočí hlášení "Poslání zprávy selhalo. Autentizace k SMTP serveru smtp.centrum.cz se nezdařila. Zkontrolujte prosím heslo a nastavený 'Způsob autentizace' v 'Nastavení účtu | Odchozí server (SMTP)'."

Vše jsem kontroloval, hesla jsou v pořádku, mazal jsem uložené heslo a zkoušel jej zadat znovu, kontroloval jsem a nakonec i měnil heslo pro přihlášení přímo na webu Centrum.cz. Nic nepomohlo.

Napadá Vás někoho, kde by mohla být chyba?
creator: boxler

title: Creation of "global-messages-db.sqlite" is not completed

title: Allow users to manually reorder email accounts in the folder pane
content:
As of Thunderbird 115+ (tested on 138.0), users are unable to manually sort or reorder the order of their email accounts in the left folder pane. Previously, the "Manually Sort Folders" add-on offered this functionality, but it is no longer compatible with current Thunderbird versions.

For users with multiple accounts (e.g. 5–10+), being able to define the account order is essential for workflow clarity and navigation. Alphabetical or custom ordering would be sufficient.

Please consider restoring native support for manual account reordering or offering a built-in account sort feature in future releases.
creator: atakan.giray

title: Problems in Sending Mail
content:
When sending mails, usually by Reply or Forward, lately I started receiving failure messages, like

Sending of the message failed. An error occurred while sending mail. The mail server responded: Relaying not allowed. Please use SMTP Authentication. For assistance please see https://netvision.cellcom.co.il/SMTP_Authentication or call 013 Netvision Tech Support +972-4-8560570 24hrs day: talmashkaot2013@gmail.com. Please check the message recipient "talmashkaot2013@gmail.com" and try again.

Netvision tech. support refuse to investigate the matter and suggest that I use their website e-mail (which works). I prefer using Thunderbird.

What is the solution to this the problem? Most e-mails still work...

title: Where has the customizable views filter function gone to?
content:
Hi,

I'm using thunderbird for over twenty years, and for ages I have been using a customizable list view where I could limit the list view of messages in a mail folder based on rules, eg. message tag, age in days, sender, has attachment, things like that, and had a lot of rules to limit the view of messages.

Now I am on a trip, away from home, with a freshly installed Ubuntu 25.04 and latest thunderbird, 128.10.0esr-1, and I can't find how to enable the selection menu to limit the view to tags or customized rules.

The quick filter bar seems to be somewhat redesigned, and it seems to have lost the option to add this menu to the quick filter bar.

Where have these customizable views gone to? I can't find them anymore, although I am sure I do have these working on my machines at home.


(And no, don't propose to use saved searches, they are not a substitute for that.)
creator: hadmut1
